channel.title: UBI + 2 Scars = Multible Scars on 1 Computer
channel.description:
A Public Release is due out today or tommorrow to all IMPSoft members! Video of Beta 8 (Crappy Viewing For YouTube, Try to FullScreen it),, trying to find a better upload.. http://youtube.com/watch?v=wMYXeoBQ8Wc Video codec: http://download.techsmith.com/tscc/tscc.exe
What is UBI(Universal Bot Interface)?
It is a method for any bot to send events to an applet.
What bot currently support it?
Our modified version of srl(Scar resource library).
What bots will support it in the future
simple vb color clickers impsoft: r-bot
What is r-bot?
The next genertion color recognition being written in c#.
What does it UBI cost?
nothing
How do i get UBI?
Currently in beta testing. Apply here: http://www.impsoft.net/viewforum.php?f=20 Video codec: http://download.techsmith.com/tscc/tscc.exe Video of SRL on UBI: http://www.upit.be/download.php?id=1330 http://rapidshare.de/files/22668639/UBI_preview_avi.avi.html Trackbacks: SRL: http://82.92.130.193/forums UBI: http://www.impsoft.net

simple vb color clickers impsoft: r-bot
